item.description:
Hi All,

Here is our Valentines party. This time we are having it at Antoinette's house.

She will provide the Paper goods, Cups, and a few main dishes. Please bring some Good Drinks, and Snack food. As you can see from the photo, kids should not be invited to this one.

Also, if you have a game, or something to entertain us, bring it along.

We will provide the GGooood Times, So come on Enjoy the Fun.

The fee for this meetup is only $2.00 at the door.

If you want to bring a main course dish, please list it in the answer box when you RSVP.

Yea Antoinette. You are Awsome.

Steve C.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be inside partying....Come on in !!

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Valentine's Pre Day Party.
